reviews.review: shts hard and i suck at it...but still play it over and over. the players make the game enjoyable and add me so u can carry me i need skins for monies!!!

This game is trash, So many cheaters, and then if you have a great game everyone just thinks you're cheating too. Community extremely toxic on so many levels. Was on the game of my life and they all start harassing me and then kick me from the game one match away from a winning finish. Had to mute everything so my 5 year old didn't hear this immature prepubescent lobby of hot pocket enthusiast pooping from the mouth. You can accuse anyone doing great and all you need is one more guy to help convince the whole lobby. All that hard work for nothing. FU Valve and the entire CS community.
